description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Defend what's yours in this monstrous mixture of Tower Defense and Apartment Management Sim! Recruit monsters to live in your apartment and fight for you when heroes attack!
description.short: Defend what's yours in this monstrous mixture of Tower Defense and Apartment Management Sim! Recruit monsters to live in your apartment and fight for you when heroes attack!
